Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Fragment of a cylindrical vase, with well-marked curvature in the lower part of the body and a ring-shaped foot. It shows a painted decoration on the basis of horizontal lines, oblique lines and triangles, covering the piece almost entirely. Paste of a reddish colour with a coating of the same colour.
